entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 31.
